  letter-spacing:.14em;
  opacity:.78;
  border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.12);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.045);
  padding:.35rem .7rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  margin-bottom: .7rem;
}
.be-hero__title{
  margin:.15rem 0 .5rem 0;
  font-size: clamp(2.05rem, 2.9vw, 3.05rem);
  letter-spacing: -0.02em;
}
.be-hero__subtitle{
  margin:0 auto .6rem;
  max-width: 72ch;
  opacity: .92;
  line-height: 1.45;
}
.be-hero__cta{ display:flex; gap:.7rem; justify-content:center; flex-wrap:wrap; }

/* ===== Fondo vivo: blobs ===== */
.hero-bg{ position:absolute; inset:-40px; z-index:0; pointer-events:none; filter: blur(28px); opacity:.50; }
.hero-bg .blob{ position:absolute; width:380px; height:380px; border-radius:999px; background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(209,126,48,.55), transparent 60%); }
.hero-bg .b1{ top:-80px; left:-80px; animation: float1 12s ease-in-out infinite; }
.hero-bg .b2{ top:20px; right:-120px; background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(59,73,142,.55), transparent 60%); animation: float2 14s ease-in-out infinite; }
.hero-bg .b3{ bottom:-140px; left:35%; background: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,.18), transparent 60%); animation: float3 16s ease-in-out infinite; }
@keyframes float1{ 0%,100%{ transform:translate(0,0) } 50%{ transform:translate(40px,30px)}}
@keyframes float2{ 0%,100%{ transform:translate(0,0) } 50%{ transform:translate(-45px,20px)}}
@keyframes float3{ 0%,100%{ transform:translate(0,0) } 50%{ transform:translate(0,-45px)}}
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce){ .hero-bg .blob{ animation:none; } }

/* ===== Ticker herramientas ===== */
.be-ticker{
  position:relative;
  margin: 1.0rem auto 0;
  padding: .55rem 0;
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.08);
  overflow:hidden;
}
.be-ticker__track{ overflow:hidden; width:100%; }
.be-ticker__row{
  display:flex;
  align-items:center;
  gap: 16px;
  width: max-content;
  will-change: transform;
  animation: tickerMove 26s linear infinite;
}
@keyframes tickerMove{ from{ transform: translateX(0); } to{ transform: translateX(-50%); } }
.be-ticker__fade{
  position:absolute; top:0; bottom:0;
  width: 80px;
  pointer-events:none;
  z-index:2;
}
.be-ticker__fade.left{ left:0; background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(10,14,25,1), rgba(10,14,25,0)); }
.be-ticker__fade.right{ right:0; background: linear-gradient(to left, rgba(10,14,25,1), rgba(10,14,25,0)); }
.tk{
  font-size: .92rem;
  padding: .34rem .64rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.10);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.04);
  white-space: nowrap;
  opacity: .92;
  transition: transform .16s ease, background .16s ease, border-color .16s ease, box-shadow .16s ease, opacity .16s ease;
}
.tk:hover{
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.09);
  border-color: rgba(255,255,255,.22);
  box-shadow: 0 10px 22px rgba(0,0,0,.26);
}
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce){ .be-ticker__row{ animation:none; } }

/* ===== Reveal on scroll ===== */
.be-reveal{
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(10px);
  transition: opacity .45s ease, transform .45s ease;
}
.be-reveal.is-visible{ opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }

/* ===== Section head ===== */
.be-section-head h2{ font-weight: 850; letter-spacing: -0.01em; }
.be-section-head p{ max-width: 90ch; }

/* ========= Glow din√°mico (IGUAL a Plantillas) ========= */
.be-glow{ position: relative; }
.be-glow::after{
  content:"";
  position:absolute; inset:-1px;
  border-radius: inherit;
  background: radial-gradient(
    900px circle at var(--mx,50%) var(--my,30%),
    rgba(255,255,255,.11),
    transparent 40%
  );
  opacity:0;
  pointer-events:none;
  transition: opacity .18s ease;
}
.be-glow:hover::after{ opacity:1; }

/* ========= Cards estilo Plantillas ========= */
.be-products{
  display:grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, minmax(0,1fr));
  gap: 1rem;
}
.be-products--2{ grid-template-columns: repeat(2, minmax(0,1fr)); }
.be-products--1{ grid-template-columns: 1fr; }

.be-product{
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.12);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.03);
  border-radius: 18px;
  padding: 1.0rem 1.05rem;
  box-shadow: 0 14px 34px rgba(0,0,0,.20); /* sombra normal (no glow) */
  transition: transform .16s ease, background .16s ease, border-color .16s ease, box-shadow .16s ease;
}
.be-product:hover{
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.05);
  border-color: rgba(255,255,255,.18);
  /* glow SOLO al hover */
  box-shadow:
    0 22px 56px rgba(0,0,0,.30),
    0 0 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,.06) inset,
    0 0 0 10px rgba(64,214,255,.06),
    0 0 28px var(--glow-cyan),
    0 0 42px var(--glow-green);
}
.be-product:focus-within{
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  border-color: rgba(64,214,255,.30);
  box-shadow:
    0 22px 56px rgba(0,0,0,.30),
    0 0 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,.06) inset,
    0 0 0 10px rgba(64,214,255,.06),
    0 0 28px var(--glow-cyan);
}
.be-product__top{ display:flex; gap:.75rem; align-items:flex-start; }
.be-product__icon{
  width:44px; height:44px; border-radius: 14px;
  display:grid; place-items:center;
  font-weight: 900;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.14);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.05);
  box-shadow: 0 12px 26px rgba(0,0,0,.20);
}
.be-product__badge{
  display:inline-flex;
  padding:.22rem .55rem;
  border-radius: 999px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.14);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.04);
  font-size:.78rem;
  opacity:.92;
}
.be-product__title{ font-size: 1.05rem; }
.be-product__price{ opacity:.92; font-size:.95rem; }
.be-bullets{ margin:.65rem 0 .2rem; padding-left: 1.05rem; opacity:.92; }
.be-bullets li{ margin:.34rem 0; }
.be-product__cta{ display:flex; gap:.6rem; flex-wrap:wrap; margin-top:.8rem; }

@media (max-width: 980px){
  .be-products, .be-products--2{ grid-template-columns: 1fr; }
}

/* ===== Testimonios: carrusel ===== */
.t-carousel{
  display:grid;
  grid-template-columns: 48px 1fr 48px;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items:center;
  margin-top: 12px;
}
.t-btn{
  height: 48px;
  width: 48px;
  border-radius: 14px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.18);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.06);
  color: rgba(255,255,255,.95);
  cursor:pointer;
  display:grid;
  place-items:center;
  font-size: 28px;
  line-height: 1;
  transition: transform .16s ease, background .16s ease, border-color .16s ease, box-shadow .16s ease;
}
.t-btn:hover{
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.10);
  border-color: rgba(255,255,255,.28);
  box-shadow: 0 16px 30px rgba(0,0,0,.26);
}
.t-btn:active{ transform: translateY(0px) scale(.98); }
.t-track{ position:relative; min-height: 200px; }
.t-slide{ position:absolute; inset:0; opacity:0; transform: translateY(8px); transition: opacity .2s ease, transform .2s ease; }
.t-slide.is-active{ opacity:1; transform:none; }
.t-slide blockquote{
  margin:0;
  padding: 1.05rem 1.05rem .9rem;
  border-radius: 18px;
  border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.10);
  background: rgba(255,255,255,.03);
}
.t-slide blockquote p{ margin:0 0 .55rem 0; opacity:.92; }
.t-slide blockquote p:last-child{ margin:0; opacity:1; }
@media (max-width: 900px){
  .t-carousel{ grid-template-columns: 44px 1fr 44px; }
  .t-btn{ width:44px; height:44px; font-size:26px; border-radius: 12px; }
  .t-track{ min-height: 260px; }
}

/* ===== Sticky CTA ===== */
.sticky-cta{ position:fixed; left:0; right:0; bottom:14px; display:flex; justify-content:center; pointer-events:none; z-index:50; }
.sticky-cta__inner{
  pointer-events:auto;
  display:flex; gap:12px; align-items:center;
  padding:.65rem .8rem;
  border-radius:16px;
  border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.12);
  background: rgba(10,14,25,.65);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  transform: translateY(20px);
  opacity:0;
  transition: opacity .18s ease, transform .18s ease;
}
.sticky-cta.show .sticky-cta__inner{ opacity:1; transform:none; }

/* Accesibilidad */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce){
  .be-reveal{ opacity: 1; transform: none; transition:none; }
  .be-product, .t-btn{ transition:none; }
  .t-slide{ transition:none; }
  .be-glow::after{ display:none; }
}
</style>

<script>
(function(){
  // 1) Reveal on scroll
  const els = document.querySelectorAll('.be-reveal');
  const io = new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{
    entries.forEach(e=>{
      if(e.isIntersecting){
        e.target.classList.add('is-visible');
        io.unobserve(e.target);
      }
    });
  }, {threshold: 0.12});
  els.forEach(el=>io.observe(el));

  // 2) Count-up (para tus m√©tricas)
  function animateCount(el){
    const targetRaw = el.getAttribute('data-target');
    if(!targetRaw) return;

    const target = parseFloat(targetRaw);
    const decimals = parseInt(el.getAttribute('data-decimals') || '0', 10);
    if(Number.isNaN(target)) return;

    const duration = 900;
    const start = performance.now();
    const from = 0;

    function tick(now){
      const p = Math.min(1, (now - start) / duration);
      const eased = 1 - Math.pow(1 - p, 3);
      const val = from + (target - from) * eased;

      el.textContent = decimals > 0 ? val.toFixed(decimals) : Math.round(val).toString();
      if(p < 1) requestAnimationFrame(tick);
    }
    requestAnimationFrame(tick);
  }

  const counters = document.querySelectorAll('.be-count');
  const ioCount = new IntersectionObserver((entries)=>{
    entries.forEach(e=>{
      if(e.isIntersecting){
        animateCount(e.target);
        ioCount.unobserve(e.target);
      }
    });
  }, {threshold: 0.6});
  counters.forEach(c=>ioCount.observe(c));

  // 3) Glow que sigue al mouse (para .be-glow)
  document.addEventListener('mousemove', (e) => {
    const el = e.target.closest('.be-glow');
    if(!el) return;
    const r = el.getBoundingClientRect();
    el.style.setProperty('--mx', ((e.clientX - r.left)/r.width*100).toFixed(2)+'%');
    el.style.setProperty('--my', ((e.clientY - r.top)/r.height*100).toFixed(2)+'%');
  }, {passive:true});

  // 4) Carrusel testimonios (manual, sin librer√≠as)
  const root = document.querySelector('.t-carousel');
  if(root){
    const slides = [...root.querySelectorAll('.t-slide')];
    let i = slides.findIndex(s => s.classList.contains('is-active'));
    if(i<0) i=0;

    const show = (k) => {
      slides[i].classList.remove('is-active');
      i = (k + slides.length) % slides.length;
      slides[i].classList.add('is-active');
    };

    root.querySelectorAll('.t-btn').forEach(btn=>{
      btn.addEventListener('click', ()=> show(i + parseInt(btn.dataset.dir,10)));
    });
  }

  // 5) Sticky CTA al hacer scroll
  const sticky = document.querySelector('.sticky-cta');
  if(sticky){
    const onScroll = () => sticky.classList.toggle('show', window.scrollY > 380);
    window.addEventListener('scroll', onScroll, {passive:true});
    onScroll();
  }
})();
</script>
